entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Elliot Lake
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 5:21 PM EST Friday 03 February 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Periods of light snow. Low minus 30.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. Periods of light snow beginning overnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 30. Wind chill minus 36 this evening. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 10:31 PM EST Friday 03 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Periods of snow. High minus 7.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow. Amount 2 cm. Wind becoming southwest 30 km/h gusting to 60 in the morning then light late in the afternoon. High minus 7. Wind chill minus 23 in the morning and minus 12 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 10:31 PM EST Friday 03 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 8.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow. Amount 2 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 8. Wind chill minus 13 in the evening. Forecast issued 10:31 PM EST Friday 03 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of snow. High minus 1. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of snow. High minus 1. Forecast issued 10:31 PM EST Friday 03 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Cloudy periods. Low minus 16.
entry.summary: Clearing. Low minus 16. Forecast issued 10:31 PM EST Friday 03 February 2023

entry.title: Monday: Sunny. High minus 5.
entry.summary: Sunny. High minus 5. Forecast issued 10:31 PM EST Friday 03 February 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Chance of snow. Low minus 5. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of snow. Low minus 5. Forecast issued 10:31 PM EST Friday 03 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of snow. High plus 3. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of snow. High plus 3. Forecast issued 10:31 PM EST Friday 03 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Cloudy periods. Low minus 7.
entry.summary: Cloudy periods. Low minus 7. Forecast issued 10:31 PM EST Friday 03 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: A mix of sun and cloud. High zero.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. High zero. Forecast issued 10:31 PM EST Friday 03 February 2023
